Spring_Taffy.Description: Soft and chewy with a light, refreshing taste of spring air
Summer_Sweets.Description: Bright, fruity flavors perfect for a hot summer day.
Autumn_Caramels.Description: Soft caramels with cozy fall spices.
Winter_Mints.Description: Cool, refreshing mints perfect for the winter chill.
Joja_candy.Description: A candy with the flat, sugary taste of Joja Cola. Not great.
Royal_Candy.Description: A luxurious candy fit for royalty, with a rich, smooth flavor that melts in your mouth.
Joja_candy.OI2: A sugary treat from Joja Corp.
Monocle.Description: A monocle that notices details better left unseen.
MoonMask.Description: A haunting moon mask, its look makes me feel uncomfortable.
scarecrow.Description: I took this hat off the nearest scarecrow.
EliteScarecrow.Description: A hat that makes crows think twice before coming near.
strawscarecrowhat.Description: An old scarecrow mask, it looks like it's about to collapse.
pumpkin.Description: Pumpkin hairpin capturing the Halloween spirit.
spider.Description: A spooky spider hairpin that surprisingly smells like fresh-baked treats.
jojapin.Description: Joja is not responsible for any injuries caused by this hairpin.
